MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH1 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:40pm. We are aware of the previous power cuts affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived on site and they will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:14pm on 2nd February 2021.
